sub_title: Founder & CEO @ Hiire - Coaching Recruiters and Hiring Tech Talent | Helping people taking better decisions in their careers  | Advising Startups to Hire Better | Content Creator & LinkedIn Top Voice
summary:
I always dreamt about having my own business and having 100% freedom to be where I wanted to be.

However, I always struggled to make that step. Working as a full-time employee, gave me enough challenges, money and happiness for more than 10 years of my life.

But not anymore. So in 2022 I decided to open Hiire - my first real business - focusing on helping companies to hire better and faster every single day without forgetting an amazing candidate experience. 100% digital because I will be travelling the world while I'm expanding Hiire and helping international companies.

Before, I worked for companies like Jason Associates, Feedzai, Mercedes-Benz.io, Adyen and Trengo. Hired +500 IT professionals (from Software Engineers to CTOs), created Employer Branding projects from zero and coached recruitment teams to help them go to their next level in Portugal, Germany, Netherlands and Singapore.

Since 2020 I'm actively helping great professionals find better jobs and different career paths with personalised coaching programs. That's part of Talent Booster - where I share content regarding careers, not only here on LinkedIn but also on Instagram and Tik Tok.

When I was 22 years old, I acquire my first stock, Apple and never stop investing ever since!
I'm currently investing and advising Network Me, a great start-up helping to close the gap between companies and students.

Are you looking to improve your Hiring strategy or Recruitment team? Send me and DM and let's chat!

projects.description: O Faz-Te Forward tem como objetivo aumentar a empregabilidade e a inclusão profissional de jovens adultos, apostando nas soft skills, no auto-conhecimento e no networking. Para isso, o programa baseia-se em sessões de formação, coaching e mentoria.

projects.title: Conta Connosco
projects.description:
Pro-bono initiative that brings together Portuguese professionals, willing to share their career experiences with other fellow Portuguese facing challenging times in their careers or looking for a new opportunity.

It's in tough times like the ones we live in that we must unite towards a common goal and give our fair share of support to others.

profile_positions.description:
Our aim is to change the future of recruitment. 

We worked with great clients so far:

 ✅ Factorial HR - Content Creation 
 ✅ Gapstars - Recruiting the 1st TA Manager in PT.  
 ✅ Trengo - TA management as a Service: managing a team of 3 people. 
 ✅ NetworkMe - Interviews on-demand to assess Head of Marketing 
 ✅ Ironhack - Content Creation
 ✅ JAy!dhub - Helping JAy! to build tech hubs in PT
 ✅ Letras Binárias - RPO
 ✅ Secil - Hiring Key Digital Talent 
 ✅ Zharta - Hiring key Tech Talent

And we keep working with amazing clients as well:


📌 Affereo - Hiring their first tech team 
📌 Paynest - Hiring their future Head of Engineering
📌 Unlockit - Hiring a key senior engineer 
📌 Velocix - RPO
📌 Recruit CRM - Content Creation 


Do you want to improve your hiring strategy or train your recruitment team? Send me a DM.

Hiire is launching its Career Advisory Program.

We are on a mission to transform career advisory by going beyond the traditional matching of skills and qualifications. 

Our focus is on understanding the unique goals and values of job seekers and helping them develop a personalized job search strategy that aligns with their dreams and aspirations. 

We believe in pushing boundaries and changing lives, one dream job at a time.

profile_positions.description:
Recruit Better is the Meetup for the Portuguese recruiters' community.

The Recruitment scene in Portugal was always closed, dark and with little to no room for sharing.

The Recruit Better Community wants to revolutionize the way recruiters look into Recruitment, by creating a space where recruiters feel free and empowered to share their stories, experiences, best practices, trends, hacks, approaches and strategies with peers.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
> Contract Via Hiire <

I'm continuing my journey at Trengo to hire the best people for an amazing company 

My mission is to coach, training and develop the Talent team. Additionally I'm supporting and advising Trengo in Employer Branding initiatives and HR projects.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Management as a Service (via Hiire)

profile_positions.description:
In an increasingly digital world, Trengo envisions a smooth way of connecting people with the companies behind their products and services. Our software makes it easy for customer-facing teams to collaborate on conversations via multiple channels, all in one shared inbox. Email, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, live-chat, you name it. With an A-round investment of $36M lead by Insight Partners and Peak Capital, we are strengthening our position in the Netherlands and accelerating our rapid growth in Europe.

When you meet anyone who works at Trengo, you'll most likely find them excited about continuous improvements, empowered to add their own touch to the world of online communication and eager to collaborate with diverse people on the daily.

profile_positions.title: Lead Link Employer Branding & Recruiting

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the recruiting of Lisbon Digital Tech Hub 

At the beginning of May, Mercedes-Benz opened the world's first Digital Delivery Hub in the Portuguese capital. Lisbon is currently becoming the "place to be" in the digital world. The world's most important tech-conference, the Web Summit, has been held in Lisbon since last year, for example. Mercedes-Benz is involved as a main sponsor and with numerous well-regarded speakers. The Portuguese capital is a very popular place for "digital natives" to live and work and the scenario is perfect for the new Digital Delivery Hub of Mercedes-Benz. The national government and city council also plan to use this momentum to develop Lisbon into the next digital hotspot.
